visaTypes.description: A points-tested permanent visa for invited skilled workers to live and work permanently anywhere in Australia. Does not require sponsorship by an employer, state, or family member.
keyFeatures: Live and work permanently anywhere in Australia
Travel to and from Australia for 5 years
requirements: Have an occupation on the MLTSSL
Score at least 65 points on the points test

visaTypes.description: A points-tested permanent visa for invited skilled workers nominated by an Australian state or territory government. Provides an additional 5 points for state nomination.
keyFeatures: Live and work permanently in nominating state/territory
Travel to and from Australia for 5 years
requirements: Be nominated by an Australian state or territory
Have an occupation on the MLTSSL or STSOL
Score at least 65 points (including 5 state nomination points)

visaTypes.fullName: Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 491) - State/Territory nominated
visaTypes.description: A 5-year provisional visa for points-tested skilled workers nominated by an Australian state or territory government to live and work in regional Australia. Provides pathway to permanent residence through subclass 191. Adds 15 points for state nomination.
keyFeatures: Live, work and study in regional Australia for up to 5 years
requirements: Be nominated by an Australian state or territory
Have an occupation on MLTSSL, STSOL or ROL
Score at least 65 points (including 15 regional nomination points)

visaTypes.fullName: Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 491) - Family Sponsored
visaTypes.description: A 5-year provisional visa for points-tested skilled workers sponsored by an eligible family member living in regional Australia. Provides pathway to permanent residence through subclass 191. Adds 15 points for family sponsorship.
keyFeatures: Live, work and study in regional Australia for up to 5 years
requirements: Be sponsored by an eligible family member in regional Australia
Have an occupation on MLTSSL, STSOL or ROL
Score at least 65 points (including 15 family sponsorship points)

visaTypes.description: A temporary visa for international students who have recently graduated from an Australian educational institution. Allows students to live, work, and study in Australia temporarily after completing their studies.
keyFeatures: Live, work and study in Australia temporarily
Two streams: Graduate Work stream and Post-Study Work stream
requirements: Have recently graduated from an Australian institution
Have completed at least 2 years of study in Australia

visaTypes.description: A temporary employer-sponsored visa (formerly TSS visa) that lets employers sponsor skilled workers when they cannot find an appropriately skilled Australian worker. Replaced the old 482 TSS visa in December 2024.
keyFeatures: Work for approved sponsor in nominated occupation
requirements: Be sponsored by an approved employer
Have occupation on Core Skills List
Have at least 2 years work experience

visaTypes.description: A Designated Area Migration Agreement (DAMA) stream of the TSS visa for occupations in specific regional areas where there are skill shortages. Only available in certain designated areas with active DAMAs.
requirements: Be sponsored by employer in DAMA region
Meet English language requirements (may be concession)

visaTypes.description: A permanent employer-sponsored visa for skilled workers nominated by their Australian employer. Three streams available: Direct Entry, Temporary Residence Transition, and Labour Agreement.
keyFeatures: Live and work permanently in Australia
Travel to and from Australia for 5 years
requirements: Be nominated by approved Australian employer
Have occupation on Core Skills List
Have at least 3 years work experience
Have a positive skills assessment (Direct Entry stream)

visaTypes.description: A permanent employer-sponsored visa for skilled workers to live and work in regional Australia. This visa is closed to new applicants (replaced by subclass 494), but Temporary Residence Transition stream still available for existing 457/482 visa holders.
keyFeatures: Live and work permanently in regional Australia
Travel to and from Australia for 5 years
requirements: Only available for Temporary Residence Transition stream
Must hold 457/482 visa with same employer
Have worked for at least 3 years

visaTypes.description: A 5-year provisional employer-sponsored visa for skilled workers to live and work in regional Australia. Provides pathway to permanent residence through subclass 191 after 3 years.
keyFeatures: Live and work in regional Australia for up to 5 years
requirements: Be nominated by approved regional employer
Have at least 3 years work experience

visaTypes.description: A temporary visa for occupational training in Australia. Allows participants to take part in workplace-based training to improve skills for their job, area of tertiary study, field of expertise or in a professional development training program in Australia.
requirements: Have relevant qualifications or employment background

MLTSSL.fullName: Medium and Long-term Strategic Skills List
MLTSSL.description: List of occupations in demand for medium to long-term needs

STSOL.description: List of occupations in demand for short-term needs

ROL.description: List of occupations specifically for regional areas

CoreSkillsList.description: List for Skills in Demand visa (subclass 482) and ENS (subclass 186)
